name: やみのはどう
effects: Reduce DEF and SPR by 30% and ATK and MAG by 35% for 3 turns to all enemies

desc_short.1: 降低全體敵人攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值
desc_short.0: Reduce ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all enemies
desc_short.2: 적 전체에 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 감소
desc_short.5: Reduce ATQ/DEF/MAG/ESP de todos los enemigos
desc_short.4: ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY runter, alle Ziele

desc_long.1: 降低全體敵人攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值。
desc_long.0: Reduces ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all enemies.
desc_long.2: 적 전체의 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력을 감소시킵니다.
desc_long.5: Reduce ATQ/DEF/MAG/ESP de todos los enemigos
desc_long.4: ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY runter, alle Gegner
